pullrequest.title: Tutorial on how Ignition finds resources at runtime

content.raw:
@{iche033} ,  do you think you could add some words about how Ignition Rendering finds engines at runtime, and how Ignition Sensors finds sensors at runtime?

Also, not sure if there are other resources being loaded by Ignition Rendering, on Gazebo classic I believe materials could be loaded from `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH`
content.html:
@Ian Chen , do you think you could add some words about how Ignition Rendering finds engines at runtime, and how Ignition Sensors finds sensors at runtime?

Also, not sure if there are other resources being loaded by Ignition Rendering, on Gazebo classic I believe materials could be loaded from GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH
